update cp_lanmu set TOPIC_ID = #{topicId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LANMU_NO = #{lanmuNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TYPE_ID = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ZHANSHU_COUNT = #{zhanshuCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PID = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SUB_ADDS = #{subAdds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WORDS = #{words,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, KEYWORDS=#{keyWords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, URL= #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PIC=#{pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select b.NAME from cp_topic b where b.ID=#{id}
mapper.update: update cp_lanmu c set c.LANMU_NO=c.LANMU_NO+1 where c.LANMU_NO >=#{lanmuNo} and c.TOPIC_ID=#{topicId}
update cp_lanmu c set c.LANMU_NO=#{YlanmuNo} where c.TOPIC_ID=#{topicId} and c.LANMU_NO=#{lanmuNo}
update cp_lanmu c set c.LANMU_NO=c.LANMU_NO+1 WHERE c.ID in (SELECT id from (select ID from cp_lanmu WHERE LANMU_NO BETWEEN #{lanmuNo} and #{YlanmuNo} and TOPIC_ID=#{topicId} )d)
